login.title: Login
login.minLength: Password must be at least {{count}} characters
login.hasLetter: Password must contain at least one letter
login.hasNumber: Password must contain at least one number

logout.title: Logout
logout.description: Are you sure you want to logout?

register.phoneNumberMaxLength: Phone number must be exactly 10 digits
register.phoneNumberInvalid: Phone number is not in the correct format
register.phoneNumberRepeated: Phone number is not valid (cannot be 10 repeated digits)

register.hasLetter: Password must contain at least one letter
register.hasNumber: Password must contain at least one number
register.passwordNotMatch: Password and confirm password do not match
register.policyCondition: By continuing, you agree to the

rule.minLength: Password must be at least {{count}} characters
rule.hasLetter: Password must contain at least one letter
rule.hasNumber: Password must contain at least one number

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password
forgotPassword.checkMailDescription: We have sent an email containing instructions to reset your password
forgotPassword.resetPasswordDescription: Enter new password to reset password
forgotPassword.minLength: Password must be at least {{count}} characters
